Package business.entities.character

Class Character

java.lang.Object
business.entities.character.Character
Direct Known Subclasses:
Adventurer, Cleric, Mage
public abstract class Character extends Object
Abstract class that represents a Character.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Character(Character that)
    Constructs a new Character object by copying the attributes of the specified character.
    Character(String name, String player, int xp, int body, int mind, int spirit, String characterClass)
    Constructs a new Character object with the specified name, player, experience, stats, and character class.

  • Constructor Details

    • Character

      public Character(String name, String player, int xp, int body, int mind, int spirit, String characterClass)
      Constructs a new Character object with the specified name, player, experience, stats, and character class.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the character
      player - the name of the player controlling the character
      xp - the experience points of the character
      body - the body stat of the character
      mind - the mind stat of the character
      spirit - the spirit stat of the character
      characterClass - the character class of the character

    • Character

      public Character(Character that)
      Constructs a new Character object by copying the attributes of the specified character.
      Parameters:
      that - the character to be copied

  • Method Details

    • isUnconscious

      public boolean isUnconscious()
      Checks if the character is unconscious.
      Returns:
      true if the character is unconscious, false otherwise

    • levelUp

      public boolean levelUp(int experience)
      Increases the character's experience points and checks if the character has leveled up as a result.
      Parameters:
      experience - the experience points to be added
      Returns:
      true if the character leveled up, false otherwise

    • heal

      public int heal(int amount)
      Increases the character's current health points by the specified amount. If the resulting health points exceed the maximum health points, it is adjusted to the maximum value.
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount of health points to be added
      Returns:
      the actual amount of health points added

    • takeDamage

      public void takeDamage(int damage)
      Decreases the character's current health points by the specified damage. If the resulting health points are less than or equal to zero, the character becomes unconscious.
      Parameters:
      damage - the amount of damage to be taken

    • increaseStat

      public int increaseStat(String stat, int value)
      Increases the value of the specified stat by the given amount. The valid stat values are "Body", "Mind", "Spirit", "Shield", and "hit points". For "hit points", the heal method is called instead.
      Parameters:
      stat - the stat to be increased
      value - the amount by which to increase the stat
      Returns:
      the actual amount by which the stat was increased

    • decreaseStat

      public void decreaseStat(String stat, int value)
      Decreases the value of the specified stat by the given amount. The valid stat values are "Body", "Mind", "Spirit", "Shield", and "hit points". For "hit points", the takeDamage method is called instead.
      Parameters:
      stat - the stat to be decreased
      value - the amount by which to decrease the stat

    • setUpHpForAdventure

      public void setUpHpForAdventure()
      Sets up the character's maximum health points for an adventure based on the character's body stat and level.

    • isBelowHalfHp

      public boolean isBelowHalfHp()
      Checks if the character's current health points are below half of the maximum health points.
      Returns:
      true if the character's current health points are below half of the maximum health points, false otherwise

    • healsInBattle

      public boolean healsInBattle()
      Checks if the character heals during battle.
      Returns:
      false

    • healsPartyInBattle

      public boolean healsPartyInBattle()
      Checks if the character heals the party during battle.
      Returns:
      false

    • isAreaAttack

      public boolean isAreaAttack(boolean ignored)
      Checks if the character's attack is an area attack.
      Parameters:
      ignored - a parameter that is ignored
      Returns:
      false

    • isPartyShortRestAction

      public boolean isPartyShortRestAction()
      Checks if the character's battle action is a party short rest action.
      Returns:
      false

    • hasAttackFailed

      public boolean hasAttackFailed()
      Checks if the character's attack has failed.
      Returns:
      true if the attack has failed, false otherwise

    • isAttackCritical

      public boolean isAttackCritical()
      Checks if the character's attack is critical.
      Returns:
      true if the attack is critical, false otherwise

      Evolves the character to its next form.
      Returns:
      the evolved character

      Parameters:
      dice - the dice object used to roll the initiative

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the result of the preparation action

      Returns:
      true if the preparation action is self-targeted, false otherwise
